title: Is it worth learning Python programming online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Python is one of the easiest programming languages and is so much useful. Python is used in software coding, APIs, Backend Web Development and so much more. It is ranking in Top 3 programming languages for the last 3 years, both among coders and in industry. Also, most colleges don’t directly teach Python in-depth. So, it is up to you to master it on your own. There are so many courses on YouTube and Udemy that you can look into. Just try to be patient while learning it.

Even if you are a java or web developer, it is still ok to learn python because learning more than one programming language not only improves your knowledge & experience but also make you more attractive to employers. ... It is always worth to learn a programming language that is popular & commonly used.
